name: df-psmet
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cpsmet, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s2)), nat0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wral(s4, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cle, co(co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cxad, co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3)))))))))))
comment: Define the set of all pseudometrics on a given base set. In a pseudo metric, two distinct points may have a distance zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)
